title: Emails from Nancy Hawes to SLDC that predate her appointment to the board and COI paperwork

communications.subject: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: Emails from Nancy Hawes to SLDC that predate her appointment to the board and COI paperwork
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

We are asking for copies of emails sent by to SLDC by Nancy Hawes, Mayor Spencer's Chief of Staff and SLDC's current chair, which were sent in the ten years prior to her coming to work for the city. During this time, Ms. Hawes worked for Polsinelli PC, Amstrong Teasdale and The Hawes Law Firm. We are seeking any correspondence that she may have had with SLDC during this time period, where she was active in working on local real estate matters. This includes, but is not limited to, any emails she had with SLDC relating to her work related to federal Opportunity Zones.

We are also asking a copy of any conflict of interest paperwork that Ms. Hawes would have filed as part of joining SLDC's board.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Glenn Burleigh

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Public Records Request - Volusia County
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to video footage from a police intervention, specifically from the body camera worn by the officer(s) and the dashcam of the police vehicles involved. Article:
https://atlantablackstar.com/2024/11/21/florida-couple-attacked-school-cop-police-say/

Exact date of incident: Nov 19, 2024
Names of parties involved: Jorge Rivera and his wife, Dagmarie Aponte Iturrino
Location: Deltona Middle School, about 30 miles northeast of Orlando in Volusia County

I intend to use this footage solely for educational purposes to promote a better understanding of law enforcement procedures and the application of the law.

I understand that there may be associated costs for providing this footage, and I am more than willing to cover any fees incurred. Please inform me about the necessary procedures and the costs involved.

Thank you in advance for your assistance. I trust that this footage will be invaluable for my educational efforts, and I greatly appreciate your cooperation.


Best regards,
George Smith

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

George Smith
